description: WebGL JavaScript library for displaying street level imagery from mapillary.com

name: mapillary-js

scripts.build-css: cat styles/*.css | postcss --use autoprefixer --use cssnano -o dist/mapillary.min.css
scripts.build-dev: browserify src/Mapillary.ts --plugin tsify --transform brfs --standalone Mapillary --debug | exorcist dist/mapillary.js.map > dist/mapillary.js
scripts.build-docs: typedoc --tsconfig tsconfig.docs.json --mode file --theme default --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --excludeExternals  --name MapillaryJS --out docs/
scripts.build-min: browserify src/Mapillary.ts --plugin tsify --transform brfs --standalone Mapillary | uglifyjs -m > dist/mapillary.min.js
scripts.build-watch: watchify src/Mapillary.ts --plugin tsify --transform brfs --standalone Mapillary --debug -v -o 'exorcist dist/mapillary.js.map > dist/mapillary.js'
scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-docs
scripts.lint: npm run lint-spec && npm run lint-src
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run lint-src && npm run build-min && npm run build-dev && npm run build-css && npm run copy-assets
